pricing.faq_subtitle: Check here if you have any questions
pricing.faq_question_1: What's the difference between free and paid plans?
pricing.faq_answer_1: Free plan offers 10 song downloads per month with 192kbps MP3 quality. Paid plans include unlimited downloads, WAV 24bit high quality, and commercial use rights.
pricing.faq_question_2: What are the discount benefits for annual subscriptions?
pricing.faq_answer_2: Annual subscriptions offer up to 28% discount. Basic plan: 20%, Pro plan: 25%, Master plan: 28% discount.
pricing.faq_question_3: Can I change my plan midway?
pricing.faq_answer_3: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan anytime. All plan changes take effect from the next billing cycle.
pricing.faq_answer_4: Commercial use is available for Basic, Pro, and Master plans. You can freely use for YouTube, advertising, video production, etc.
pricing.faq_answer_5: Credits are used for tailored services and adding channels. Credits are automatically recharged monthly.
pricing.faq_answer_6: Yes, it's available worldwide. However, payment methods may be limited in some regions, and there may be restrictions according to local laws.
pricing.faq_question_7: Are there team or enterprise plans?
pricing.faq_answer_7: Currently, we only offer individual plans. If you need team or enterprise plans, please contact customer service for customized solutions.
pricing.no_answer_found: Didn't find the answer you were looking for?
pricing.get_started_description: Access over 1 million high-quality tracks and upgrade your projects to the next level.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.read_carefully: Please read these terms of service carefully before using this service.

help.hero_subtitle: Find answers to your questions and get support
help.getting_started_desc: Learn the basics of using PROBGM
help.music_usage_desc: How to search, play, and use music
help.downloads_desc: Download music and manage your library
help.contact_support_desc: Get in touch with our support team
help.gs_q1: How do I create an account?
help.gs_a1: Click 'Sign In' button and choose your preferred sign-in method (Google, Email). Follow the instructions to complete registration.
help.gs_q2: What can I do with a free account?
help.gs_a2: Free accounts can browse the entire music library, preview tracks, and create playlists. Download limits apply.
help.gs_q3: How do I navigate the music library?
help.gs_a3: Use the search bar to find specific tracks, or browse by categories. You can filter by mood, genre, tempo, and more.
help.mu_q1: How do I search for music?
help.mu_a1: Use the search bar at the top. You can search by keywords, mood, genre, or instrument. Advanced filters are available for paid plans.
help.mu_q2: Can I preview tracks before downloading?
help.mu_a2: Yes, click the play button on any track to preview it. Full playback is available for all users.
help.mu_q3: How do I create and manage playlists?
help.mu_a3: Click the heart icon to add tracks to your favorites. You can organize them into custom playlists from your profile.
help.sb_q1: What payment methods do you accept?
help.sb_a1: We accept credit/debit cards (VISA, Master, JCB, UnionPay) and PayPal for international payments. Korean users can use domestic cards and bank transfers.
help.sb_q2: How do I upgrade my plan?
help.sb_a2: Go to Preference > Subscription and click 'Upgrade Plan'. Choose your desired plan and complete the payment.
help.sb_q3: How do I cancel my subscription?
help.sb_a3: Go to Preference > Subscription and click 'Cancel Subscription'. You can use the service until the end of your billing period.
help.sb_a4: Refunds are available within 7 days of purchase if you haven't downloaded any tracks. Contact support for refund requests.
help.dl_a1: Click the download button on any track. You need sufficient credits or an active subscription to download. Downloads are saved to your browser's download folder.
help.dl_a2: Paid plans get high-quality WAV 24bit files. Free plan users get MP3 192kbps format.
help.dl_q3: Where can I find my downloaded files?
help.dl_a3: Check your browser's download folder. You can also view your download history in Preference > Download History.
help.faq_q1: Can I use the music commercially?
help.faq_a1: Yes, all paid plans include commercial usage rights. You can use the music for YouTube, advertising, video production, etc. Free plan is for personal use only.
help.faq_a2: Free plan: 10 downloads/month. Basic plan: 50 downloads/month. Pro and Master plans: Unlimited downloads.
help.faq_a3: No, account sharing is prohibited and may result in account suspension. Each user needs their own subscription.
help.faq_q4: Do you offer team or enterprise plans?
help.faq_a4: Currently we offer individual plans only. For team or enterprise needs, please contact our sales team at ir@whirik.com.
help.contact_message: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.
